seriesJson.title: Negro spiritual
seriesJson.description: Talks by Rolf Cahn, folksinger and musicologist, with music from records, including replays from old collections.

node.title: White revivalist tune
node.description: This lecture focuses on the white revivalist tune and the emotional basis of spirituals.

node.title: African musical heritage
node.description: This lecture focuses on African musical heritage and the slave trade.
